name: Look Behind You
description:
This is a small horror game designed to provide fast chill and intense.

Do not play this game if you have heart or high blood pressure problem.

------------- Required:

OS system: Win XP, Win 7, Win 8, Win 10.

VIDEO CARD:Nvidia GeForce 410M graphics memory 512MB

RAM: 512MB
Free disk space: 65MB

-------------Control:

USe W, key to move right. Shift+W key to run. Left mouse to throw head.

-------------Game introduction:

You waked up in a strange forest, surrounded by mannequins, some of those are haunted and they are not what you think when you are not watching them. Press the throw button to kill haunted mannequin with head, pick up red box to gain more heads.

There is no way to run or hide.

3 different game modes provide you 3 different kinds of horror experience.

1. Chill mode. This game mode provides just pure psychological horror and intense, all haunted mannequins only go after you when you are not watching.

2. *Chaos mode. This game mode has another kind of haunted mannequins, they only got angry when you watching them.

3. *Adrenalind mode. In this game mode haunted mannequin flying everywhere, they don't care if you are watching or not.

Basically this game has three difficulties:

1.Easy. Turn off the sound and play it with other people around.

2.Normal. Turn on the sound and play it alone.

3.Expert. Use headphone and play it alone in a light off room during nighttime.

You can also use it as an air conditioning app in summer time.

Feel free to let me know if there is any problem.
